channel.title: Glitch Plz help
channel.description:
hi everyone i have a problem/glitch
when ever i press the equiped armor thing that shows what your wearing it freezes your account and boots you does anyone now why this is happening
+
and why is everyone invisable and how do i fix this because i really want to use this source but i dont want to amke a client well not atm so is there a way i can fix it.

item.title: Glitch Plz help
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

oh ok then i how do i delete the items so you dont start with them and just add all client items oh + btw i cant see my self even lmao

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch Plz help
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

well if you cant see yourself you have items that are unknown to the client or if its other people you cant see probably same thing. the reason it freezes is because you might be on wrong client, coz when im on a server and i go on dodian client the main one i go on freezes when i clic what im wearing because the items arent known or just invalid on that client.

that is my answer hopefully it helped.

Read full topic
